tldr: Versions of the `mysql2` package prior to 3.9.4 are vulnerable to prototype poisoning due to insecure creation of the results object and improper sanitization of user input passed through the `parserFn` in `text_parser.js` and `binary_parser.js`.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version of this package <= 3.9.3.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `mysql2` library to the patch version.
